description: Aruk Language Method (ALM) is an original language learning methodology designed by Aruk. It focuses on structure-based, usage-driven acquisition without rote memorization, emphasizing linguistic understanding over grammar drills.
notes: This method is the original work of Aruk and must be attributed clearly in any derivative or shared form.
Changes made to the method must be indicated and cannot imply endorsement by the original author.
The 'ALM' name is used here to refer to the official version created by Aruk.
